item.title: Kremlin, describing 'information frenzy,' declines to comment on Ukraine negotiations
item.description: Kremlin spokesperson Dmitry Peskov again declined to clarify Moscow's position in the U.S.-Ukraine negotiations regarding Russia's full-scale invasion...

item.title: 6 dead as Russian missiles 'rain down' in Kyiv, Ukrainian officials say
item.description: "The enemy attack on Kyiv is ongoing," Kyiv Mayor Ihor Terekhov said in a post to Telegram early Tuesday local time.

item.title: 5 dead, including 3 children, in Colorado car crash, police say
item.description: Five people, including three children, have died in a car crash south of Denver, Colorado, according to authorities.

item.title: WATCH: Pentagon investigating Sen. Kelly, citing 'serious allegations of misconduct'
item.description: The Department of Defense on Monday said it is launching a "thorough review" into Democratic Sen. Mark Kelly, citing "serious allegations of misconduc...

item.title: WATCH: 'Gobble' and 'Waddle' enjoy hotel stay ahead of presidential turkey pardon
item.description: Ahead of Tuesday's annual presidential turkey pardon ceremony, "Gobble" and "Waddle" are spending the night at the Willard Hotel in Washington, D.C., ...
